pony.HashExtensions

Extensions for THash. For using write: using pony.Ultra;
authors
AxGord
type
class
defined in
pony.Ultra


Static Methods

len(a : Hash<Dynamic>) : Int

map<A, B>(a : Hash<map.A>, f : map.A -> map.B) : Hash<map.B>

push<T>(h : Hash<Array<push.T>>, key : String, value : push.T) : Void

Example: 
      var h:Hash<Array<Int>> = new Hash<Array<Int>>();
      h.push('a', 42);
      h.push('a', 27);
      h;//{a => [42, 27]}
This is alternative for code: 
      var h:Hash<Array<Int>> = new Hash<Array<Int>>();
      if (!h.exists('a'))
           h.set('a', [42]);
      else
        h.get('a').push(42);
      //etc...
